name: [MLG] 3D Experimental Platformer from the 420th dimension
description:
Hi m8s,

Welkum to a experimental 3D 𝕄𝕃𝔾 platformer featuring Conker & other copyrighted characters (which reminds me, F.B.I might be knockin' on my door sůn) in another set of copyrighted settings. But true art is about composition, and true MLG is about bulšit.

I've noticed that normíez prefer their browser to load a 576MB file without any extra clicks than to download a 176MB executable.

Too bad fellow, if you want a WebGL build, download Unicef's Unity and build it yourself from the repository below!

https://github.com/ad48hp/Ruby-Christmas-Adventure [NOT WORKING YET, github uploader™ stuck on 117th file, the status might čendž sůn though]  Fajnly after 9,11 hurz state changed to workin' (spešl thenkz to NormíFagotLeteJDzRatFan69 for reporting bug about missing bug reporter)

FAQ:

Why is the splash screen so genuinely ugly ?

I don't know, m9. I'm too lazy to come up with a better one.

Why is there just one question in the FAQ ?

That's two now. Wejt 'till more people ask me šit to answer.

The current alpha beta 0.69b version is using a map from Banjo Dreamie.

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC2P5WqJx5ttZTnK7l-caIXQ
